schools.name: Seneca Elementary School South Campus
schools.school-summary: Seneca Elementary School South Campus, a public school located in Seneca, IL, serves grades 5-8 in the Seneca Central Consolidated School District 170.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Seneca Grade School North Campus
schools.school-summary: Seneca Grade School North Campus, a public school located in Seneca, IL, serves grades PK-4 in the Seneca Central Consolidated School District 170.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 7 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Seneca High School
schools.school-summary: Seneca High School, a public school located in Seneca, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Seneca Twp Hsd 160 School District.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 6 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
